description:
Pokémon Hunter Rhyperior is an extremely strong Pokémon that assists its master in capturing rare Pokémon to be sold on the market. It was sent out to battle Meowth and James and was able to defeat them and capture Meowth, James` Inkay and Jessie`s Pumpkaboo for a short time.
James went to get help from Ash Ketchum and his friends and together they all joined up to battle Dosidon. Wobbuffet was instrumental in this battle by holding off Pokémon Hunter Rhyperior powerful attacks and striking a decisive blow with Mirror Coat to defeat the Pokémon Hunter Rhyperior who landed on the truck and destroyed it.
name: Dosidon (Pokemon Hunter)
